name: SLCTrips - TK-000 - Mt. Olympians TripKit
description:
A comprehensive educational TripKit that transforms Utah's 29 county guardians into grade-appropriate adventures for 4th-grade teachers. Blends mythic storytelling with Utah Core Standards through location-based learning, featuring magical animal guardians who teach geography, history, and conservation. Includes safety protocols and field trip guides to turn Utah's landscape into a classroom for discovery, where students become junior guardians protecting the state's natural and cultural treasures.

*One-liner: "Where Utah folklore meets 4th-grade field trips - a teacher-ready, safety-first educational guide."*
